rows.label: qst701102_msg0001
rows.name:
Hmm? What is it? I don't
have any appointments.

rows.label: qst701102_msg0002
rows.name: I'm sorry to intrude so suddenly.

rows.label: qst701102_msg0003
rows.name:
Actually, I heard you
were building a ship...

rows.label: qst701102_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm in the middle of confirming that right
now. For the world, for the people, for Iira,
I'm working tirelessly, day and night.

rows.label: qst701102_msg0005
rows.name:
As you can see, we're short
on both people and materials,
and we're extremely busy...

rows.label: qst701102_msg0006
rows.name: Oh? What was I about to do?

rows.label: qst701102_msg0007
rows.name: ...Are you okay?

rows.label: qst701102_msg0008
rows.name:
You haven't rested much,
have you? We'll help too.

rows.label: qst701102_msg0009
rows.name: Really? That would be a great help!

rows.label: qst701102_msg0010
rows.name:
Then, could you get me one glass plate,
ten pieces of lumber, and find a helmsman?
I don't think I can get to that...

rows.label: qst701102_msg0011
rows.name:
Hah! I remember! Arranging
for the paint!!

rows.label: qst701102_msg0012
rows.name:
Eh!? Wait a minute, a
little more detail...!!

rows.label: qst701102_msg0013
rows.name: ...He disappeared in an instant.

rows.label: qst701102_msg0014
rows.name:
He's an interesting person. It
feels like his thoughts and
actions are directly connected.

rows.label: qst701102_msg0015
rows.name:
You're enjoying this like it's someone
else's problem, but do you understand? At
this rate, we won't know what to collect.

rows.label: qst701102_msg0016
rows.name:
How about we visit Arb-san
and ask for the details?

rows.label: qst701102_msg0017
rows.name:
Even to find a helmsman,
it would take too long if
we have no leads at all.

rows.label: qst701102_msg0018
rows.name:
You're right. In times like these,
we should follow a sure procedure.

rows.label: qst701102_msg0019
rows.name:
So you're going to make the
master take responsibility
for his apprentice's mess.

rows.label: qst701102_msg0020
rows.name:
Why do you always have to
resort to such harsh words?

rows.label: qst701102_msg0021
rows.name:
Still, I wonder what he's
going to do, building a
ship in such a hurry...
